Uses of Interface
components.Node

Packages that use Node
Package Description
components  

  • Uses of Node in components

    Classes in components that implement Node
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Branch
    Represents a local branch
    class  Customer
    Represents a customer that creates packages to deliver
    class  Hub
    Represents a sorting center
    class  NonStandardTruck
    Represents a vehicle for transferring packages from the sorting center to branches and back
    Carry only NonStandardPackage
    Only one package per trip.
    class  StandardTruck
    Represents a vehicle that used for delivering small packages and standard packages Transfer many packages per trip. Collects only SmallPackage and StandardPackage. Got a weight limit.
    class  Truck
    Represents a vehicle that used for delivering packages.
    class  Van
    Represents a vehicle that used for delivering small packages and standard packages Transfer only one package per trip. Collects only SmallPackage and StandardPackage.
    Methods in components that return Node
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Node Tracking.getNode()
    Access to node
    Methods in components with parameters of type Node
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Package.addTracking​(Node node, Status status)
    Add a new Tracking to the package and change its status
    Example: Package(new HUB(),Status.COLLECTION)
    default void Node.handlePackage​(Package p, Node source, Node dest, Status status)
    Take care to transfer the package and add a record to the package tracking
    void Tracking.setNode​(Node node)
    Change the location of this record
    Constructors in components with parameters of type Node
    Constructor Description
    Tracking​(int time, Node node, Status status)
    Constructs and initializes a Tracking with values
    Example: Tracking(1,new Branch(), Status.COLLECTION)
